Entry.JapaneseText: プルート
<Claus>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claus>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Suzu>
Entry.EnglishText: <Suzu>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>
Entry.EnglishText: <Cless>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
オリジンの力を 使ったのは貴様たちか
Entry.EnglishText: I see, so you were the maggots using Origin's power.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオス戦役以来だな
Entry.EnglishText: It's been since the fight against Dhaos.

Entry.JapaneseText: その節はずいぶんと 世話になったな。 こたびは何用だ
Entry.EnglishText: That time I was asked to assist with your cause. What concerns you this time?

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔界へ帰りなさい、 プルート！
Entry.EnglishText: Return to the Daemonium, Pluto!

Entry.JapaneseText: かつて、ともに戦った者を 不当に排除するか
Entry.EnglishText: So you would fight an old comrade.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不当に 地上を侵略しているのは そちらです！
Entry.EnglishText: The one who started this violence is you by attacking the surface!

Entry.JapaneseText: 精霊王との契約で 閉じられた扉を開き、 地上を瘴気に沈めた！
Entry.EnglishText: You have dissolved your contract with the King of the Spirits, opened the barrier and filled the world with poisonous Miasma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 精霊王との契約か…… 確かにそんなものもあったな
Entry.EnglishText: It is true I have made a pact with the King of the Spirits...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、 もはや数千年も前の 朽ち果てた約束
Entry.EnglishText: However, that is a promise made thousands of years in the past, rotten away by the passage of time.

Entry.JapaneseText: 精霊の王との崇高な契約を 『朽ち果てた』とは……
Entry.EnglishText: The contract with the King of the Spirits has..."rotten away."..?

Entry.JapaneseText: 知らぬようだから、 教えてやる
Entry.EnglishText: If you are ignorant to the circumstances I would be glad to tell you.

Entry.JapaneseText: もともと、 この地上は我々のもの だったのだぞ
Entry.EnglishText: We are the genuine rulers of the surface.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだって？
Entry.EnglishText: What's that!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラグナロク後、 この地上はその影響で 瘴気の海に満たされていた
Entry.EnglishText: The fallout of Ragnarok was severe. The surface was plunged fully into an ocean of Miasma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我々、魔界の民は その瘴気の海から 生まれたのだ
Entry.EnglishText: We denizens of the Daemonium were born in said precious sea of Miasma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 百数十年に渡って我々は、 この地上を支配した
Entry.EnglishText: A hundred decades or so passed. The surface was rightfully in our control.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……嘘だ……
Entry.EnglishText: No...that has to be a lie...

Entry.JapaneseText: 嘘ではない
Entry.EnglishText: This is only the truth.

Entry.JapaneseText: その世界の支配者たる我々を 精霊王オリジンは魔界へと 放逐したのだ
Entry.EnglishText: Our domination of the surface was cut short by the ruler of the world. Origin saw fit to banish our kind to the Daemonium.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界をラグナロク以前の 人の世界に戻すため
Entry.EnglishText: With his powers he decided to bring the world and people back to how they were prior to Ragnarok.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから今度はおまえたちが それを自分たちの手に 取り戻そうというのか
Entry.EnglishText: So you believe you are just reclaiming what was snatched away from you, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: その通り、 それが我ら魔界の民の悲願
Entry.EnglishText: That is correct. Our dearest wish is for the Daemonium denizens to rule in their rightful realm.

Entry.JapaneseText: やがて、すべての街が 瘴気の底に沈む
Entry.EnglishText: Soon, no town will be exempt from the all-engulfing Miasma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が幾億の同胞たちが、 魔界より姿を現し、 世界をその掌中にするだろう
Entry.EnglishText: With my innumerable brethren, the Daemonium will overwhelm and claim the world that we deservedly own.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなんさせねー！ な、<Suzu>ちゃん
Entry.EnglishText: Keep on dreaming, oversized slug! Right, <Suzu>?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい。あなたを倒して、 私はこの世界を守ります
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. I will defeat you and protect our world!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らが悲願を阻む者、 許すわけにはいかぬ
Entry.EnglishText: You who will not let our dearest wish come true...prepare to suffer annihilation.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来い！ 叩きのめして、 その魂、魔界の底へ 封じ込めん！
Entry.EnglishText: Come! I shall mince your bodies apart and bury your souls to the deepest throes of the Daemonium!!
